english.segment1: Chorus: We expect You. Anytime, anytime. And how we wait. To see Your blessed face. Your blessed face. And we expect You anytime
english.segment3: Verse: (So until You return, Lord, we will). Keep the fires burning. Keep the wheels turning. Keep the praises ringing in our souls. How our hearts are yearning. Just for Your returning. You promised to come and take us home. You promised to take us home, take us home
english.segment4: We expect You, we expect You. We expect You anytime
